News.Title: Grand Continent Hotels Signs US Hotel Agreements
News.Summary: Grand Continent Hotels announces signing of agreements for three new hotels in the USA, marking expansion into the American hospitality market.

News.Title: Grand Continent Hotels: Dubai Launch Marks International Expansion
News.Summary: Grand Continent Hotels and Resorts Ltd is opening its first international property in Dubai within three months. The company plans to expand to 5,000 hotels by 2028 from the current 21. New properties are planned in Gujarat, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, and Gurgaon. The company also inaugurated a new 72-room hotel in Chennai.
